casebody.data:
IN RE PAROLE OF Ronald IRWIN Macomb County Prosecuting Attorney, Appellee,
v.
Ronald Irwin, Appellant. Parole Board, Intervenor-Appellee. SC: 158077
COA: 342963 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of appellant to extend the time for filing his reply is GRANTED. The reply submitted on September 5, 2018, is accepted for filing.
